headline: Better Artificial Intelligence Stock: Palantir Technologies vs. IBM
summary: It's been an excellent year for stock market investors.  The S&P 500 index has delivered an excellent 26% return thus far in 2024, driven by resilient macroeconomic conditions, record corporate earnings, and growing optimism about artificial intelligence's (AI) transformative potential across the economy.  Palantir Technologies (NYSE: PLTR) and International Business Machines (NYSE: IBM) are technology sector leaders capturing strong demand for innovative AI applications, propelling the two stocks to an all-time high.
